column1: NGR is from 1950s record and is adjacent to site of the reservoir. Altitudes match.
Jan to Mar 1947 readings have a comment "…open to doubt… snow..". Readings left in this record

There are 6 gauges in the Upper Usk region and there is sigificant duplication of readings bewtween gauges 2, 3 and 4. This gauge has some duplications with the other gauges but this is probably coincidental.
